successes.title: Sense: Know More. Sleep Better.
successes.description: Sense is a simple system that tracks your sleep behavior, monitors the environment of your bedroom and reinvents the alarm.

Pledges.description: A huge thank you and your name written on our website.
An awesome Hello t-shirt and your name immortalized on our website.
Our great Hello t-shirt and a beautiful poster of all of the components in Sense as well as your name engraved in our websites HTML.
Get Sense and a Sleep Pill for the early-backer Kickstarter price of $99. Pre-orders will be $129.
Get Sense and two Sleep Pills for the early-backer Kickstarter price of $129.
Get Sense and Sleep Pill for the early-backer Kickstarter price, our wonderful t-shirt and our beautiful poster.
Get two Senses and one Sleep Pill for each for the early-backer Kickstarter.
Get two Senses and two Sleep Pills for each for the early-backer Kickstarter.
Get one for the whole family (and maybe for your friends too)! Get five for nearly the same price as four. You'll be everyone's favorite.
Get one for the whole family (and maybe for your friends too)! Get five Senses and two Sleep Pills per Sense. You'll be everyone's favorite.
Pick your own color for Sense. Our Industrial Designers will work with you to pick the exact color you want. We'll never do this again, ever.

Come to our office in San Francisco where you'll get to meet the team, but more importantly, be one of the first to get your hands on Sense by assembling yours with our engineers. You'll learn intimately how everything was designed and built by step-by-step building your own Sense.
